definition: abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: And then we were into the beautiful hills and mountains of Bosnia-Herzegovina.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我們就進入了波黑美麗的山區。

sentences.english: Bosnia and Herzegovina is a country in Southern Europe, and is going to join the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 波黑是東南歐的一個國家，即將加入歐盟。

sentences.english: Bosnia and Herzegovina a few times in the game hit the goal post, which makes Portugal a false alarm.
sentences.chinese: 波黑在比賽中幾次擊中門柱，這讓葡萄牙虛驚一場。

sentences.english: The Parliamentary Assembly is the lawmaking body in BH.
sentences.chinese: 國會是波黑的立法主體。

sentences.english: The signing of the Dayton accords shed some light of peace.
sentences.chinese: 代頓協議的簽訂，使波黑地平線上露出和平的曙光。

sentences.english: BH’s primary education lasts for eight years.
sentences.chinese: 波黑的初級教育要持續8年的時間。

sentences.english: Li stressed that the Chinese government attaches great importance to developing its relations with BiH.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星強調，中國政府重視發展與波黑的關係。

sentences.english: Topic also briefed the Chinese side on the latest developments of the situations in BiH.
sentences.chinese: 託還向中方介紹了波黑局勢的最新情況。

pinyin: Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4
related.word: 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania
